level.heading: Rescission.
level.text: All organizational orders and parts thereof in conflict with any of the provisions of this chapter are rescinded, except that any regulations adopted or promulgated by virtue of the authority granted by such orders shall remain in force until revised, amended, or repealed.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition, see ยง 111 of Developmental Disabilities Services Management Reform Emergency Amendment Act of 2006 (D.C. Act 16-672, December 28, 2006, 54 DCR 1155).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 16-264, see notes following ยง 7-761.01.
